attributes.action: Bring in a nationwide curfew for children/young people that stretches from
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
18.00 for children aged 8  years and under
19.00 for children aged 10 years and under
21.00 for children aged 16 years and under.
Children would naturally be allowed to play within the confines of their own gardens but let the British people enjoy quiet and peaceful streets in the evening. 
Children going to organised events such as youth clubs/scouts/guides etc will be issued with a pass. 
The parents of any child found roaming the streets without any permit will be subject to a fine the first time. Any further incidents should result in the parent having to attend a compulsory parenting class.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
